problem_text:
19.7. The group of virtual pure braids V Pn, n ⩾2, is generated by elements λij, 1 ⩽i ̸= j ⩽n, and is defined by the relations λijλkl = λklλij, λkiλkjλij = λijλkjλki, where different letters denote different indices.
a) Construct a normal form of words in the group V Pn for n ⩾4.
b) Is the group V Pn linear for n ⩾4? It is known that the group V P3 is linear.
V. G. Bardakov
